doc.title: Meadowlandz
doc.plot: When an African-American twenty-something finds his Nigerian immigrant stepfather passed out drunk in their project building hallway, he decides to find the unconscious man a more suitable place to sleep. After he and his friends spend the night driving through urban New Jersey futilely trying to unload the man, tensions build, frustrations mount and they find themselves in an industrial swamp between New York and New Jersey called the The Meadowlands.
